mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_audi ( aName, aSType, aVType, aTheme, aThemeSubInfo, floor, refTno) VALUES ( #{aName}, #{aSType}, #{aVType}, #{aTheme}, #{aThemeSubInfo}, #{floor}, #{theater.tNo})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_audi AS audi LEFT JOIN tbl_theater AS theater ON audi.refTno = theater.tNo WHERE audi.aNo = #{aNo}
SELECT * FROM tbl_audi AS audi LEFT JOIN tbl_theater AS theater ON audi.refTno = theater.tNo WHERE audi.refTno = #{tNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_audi SET aName=#{aName}, aSType=#{aSType}, aVType=#{aVType}, aTheme=#{aTheme}, aThemeSubInfo=#{aThemeSubInfo}, floor=#{floor}, refTno=#{theater.tNo} WHERE aNo=#{aNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT audi.*, theater.tNo, theater.tName FROM tbl_audi AS audi LEFT JOIN tbl_theater AS theater ON audi.refTno = theater.tNo
ORDER BY audi.aNo DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

SELECT count(audi.aNo) FROM tbl_audi AS audi LEFT JOIN tbl_theater AS theater ON audi.refTno = theater.tNo
ORDER BY audi.aNo DESC

where.if: audi.aName like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or audi.aSType like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or audi.aVType like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or audi.aTheme like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or audi.aThemeSubInfo like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or audi.floor like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or theater.tName like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
